title: Meta expands Nvidia deal to use millions of AI chips in data center build-out, including standalone CPUs
summary_full: Meta expands partnership with Nvidia in a deal likely worth tens of billions, for deploying millions of GPUs and new standalone CPUs in AI data centers
summary_public: Meta expands partnership with Nvidia in a deal likely worth tens of billions, for deploying millions of GPUs and new standalone CPUs in AI data centers
